sentence.Network_en: The placing of these millions added seriously and most uncomfortably to the family expenses -- in tallow candles.

sentence.Network_en: He turned to the fireplace, where a big kettle of tallow for candles was heating.
sentence.Network_cn: 他转向壁炉, 炉上熬着一大壶灌蜡烛用的牛油.

sentence.Network_en: Tallow alcohol can be further refined into cetyl and stearyl alcohols.
sentence.Network_cn: 牛脂醇可以进一步提炼成十六烷和十八烷醇.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: perhaps from Middle Low German; related to Dutch talk and German Talg

entry.tran: (用于制造蜡烛、肥皂的)动物油脂
entry.def: Tallow is hard animal fat that is used for making candles and soap.

means.word_mean: 1. obtained from suet and used in making soap, candles and lubricants
